title: kowsumbhavasanOpEtE
sahitya:
kausumbhavasanOpEtE kAmitArthadE





anupallavi



 shrI shAmbhavI ninE dikkammA enagE shivE jaganmAtE dEvarAjanutE



caraNam

 ninna neneyada manavadEtakE ninna nutisada rasana edakE ninna nODada

 kaNgaLEtakE ninna bhajisida bhakti EtakE ninna bhaktaranupacari sadihatanna

bALuva badukadEtakE enna tappa mannisammA sannutE gauri harikEsha sundari
